name: Enolc
description:
You have the extraordinary ability to reverse time, the only thing is, a clone of your skeleton is left in your place when you do. You have control over these skeletons and you'll need them to escape the place you found the artefact that introduced this strange ability.

Made as part of the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

Assets based on the 1-bit pack by Kenney.

Left Stick/Arrows to Move.
A/Space to Jump.
B/R to Rewind/Clone.
Select/Tab to Restart Level

Thanks and have fun!
